attributes.background: The EU referendum has just happened, and the poll results show that the older generation voted to leave, whereas the younger voted to stay. This shows that people who maybe have, 10, 20 years to live are deciding the future of those with their entire life ahead of them. That's not right.

rejection.details: This petition does not specify to what age the limit for the franchise should be lowered. It is thus unclear what action the Government is being asked to take.
